website_summaries.verdict: Creates lovely, thin cheese curls, but offers little in versatility.
pros: High-quality product fit to be the showpiece on your charcuterie tray
Creates delicate curls out of any hard cheese, or some softer versions if chilled
Includes marble round board, steel pin, and curling knife
cons: Can only be used with cheese wheels and certain types of cheese

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I have wanted a cheese curler for many years and was so excited to get it. Then I discovered there are only two kinds of cheese that will actually work on the machine and both are very hard to find and very expensive. I was thinking I could use many kinds of cheese. I have not used mine now in two years...getting the correct cheese is an ordeal and it goes bad before you can use it all. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on two rounds of cheese... ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on two rounds of cheese..... now the glue has come undone on the metal disc with prongs holding cheese in place and the knob on the turn blade. Only ever hand washed.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Arrived w/ broken handle
customer_reviews.text: ...but Amazon shipped a replacement immediately. Works well and looks very nice. Beautiful marble base gives it a substantial feel, and it holds the cheese in place very well. Would have awarded five stars, but for the broken handle. Amazon receives five stars for immediately shipping a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Oldoarsman

customer_reviews.title: This one with the marble base is so much better, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I had one with a wooden base that cracked. This one with the marble base is so much better, easy to clean, and my guests just love to curl their cheese as they wish. Always a conversation starter and so good with a good cheese on it. I prefer the "Tete des Moines" Swiss cheese of course.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Addelia

customer_reviews.title: This product has a limit on how it can be used.
customer_reviews.text: The Boska Cheese Curler is very sturdy and looks very nice. I didn't use mine I returned it because after I received it I realized it has very limited use and it takes way too much space to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find here in the US!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this when we were in Germany and thought of getting one. I did not end up buying it because of its weight. I was so happy to find it on Amazon USA! So excited to use it. This stuff is a conversation piece at parties :)
customer_reviews.author: red olives

customer_reviews.title: First one arrived without curling knife, had to send ...
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived without curling knife, had to send it back. The plate and the pin looked well made. I'm waiting for the second delivery, hopefully all three items are included?!
customer_reviews.author: Ursel B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this curler. we have had ours for quite a while ...this one was a gift for a friend. The quality is great, shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread Bun

customer_reviews.title: she and her family love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my sister, she and her family love it!
customer_reviews.author: margaret h hodges

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and love the presentation of this famous cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Darilene Bonnet

customer_reviews.title: Marble based Girolle is well worth the cost!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this Marble based Girolle is more expensive than the wood based models, but they're well worth the cost considering they won't split or crack after a few Washington!
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works great and would recommend over and over again. Boska always has great products so this was no surprise to me.
customer_reviews.author: Clint J

customer_reviews.title: HIghly Recommended !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very, very nice. Excellent quality. Heavier and sturdier than I was expecting. I bought one as a gift and we used it for the Superbowl party. Nice thin shavings that melted in our mouths with the cracker. Highly recommended for someone who has "everything" in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Flo vannoy

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought Tete de Moine as soon as the Boska Holland Monaco Collection Marble Cheese Curler was delivered. It is the only way to enjoy this cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Polistico

customer_reviews.title: Very good gift idea for people who have everything.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would be a good idea for my hard-to-shop-for parents, but they are foodies, and this thing is a hit right out of the box. They are both delighted, as this is something they will enjoy but would not have thought to buy for themselves. The positive reviews beneath mine are on the mark. This and a wheel of tete de moine are a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Owen S. Good

customer_reviews.title: Boska Cheese Curler
customer_reviews.text: The cheese is very difficult to cut with this device. The cheese does not hold still on the platter. The cheese is cold and the pin and slicer have been oiled as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and also when the extra $$$ for the correct cheese. Doesn't work, that's about as clear as I can be. I returned it and the cheese.
customer_reviews.author: jboll33

customer_reviews.title: Make a cheese something special
customer_reviews.text: Just loved this cheese curler. The marble base (usually is wood) makes it easier to clean and looks trendy. Be sure to buy the right cheese to use it. This makes your Wine&Cheese event something special. Didn't try yet to curl chocolate but it seams it'll work too. I'm waiting for the glass dome in order to storage properly the cheese while in use. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LRK

customer_reviews.title: Best Cheese Curler!
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! This is an awesome party conversation piece! Makes the cheese look so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia970

product_meta.title: Boska Holland Cheese Curler Marble - Pro Collection
product_meta.description: At Boska Holland we've been crazy about cheese for over 100 years! It all started near Gouda, home of the original Gouda cheeses, where Willem Bos made his first cheese tools for local cheese farmers. From that day it's our family tradition to inspire you on your journey through the delicious cheeses of the world. Explore cheese and enjoy it. Boska represents beautiful, smart products for cheese. With the Boska cheese curler, you can turn home cooking into a fine culinary experience in no time. The marble cheese curler slices off a very thin curl allowing the delicate flavor of this cheese to develop surprisingly well. The curls release the best of its authentic taste. A treat as a snack or for dessert. Very tasty with some fresh ground pepper, a piece of crispy bread, walnuts, grapes and your favorite wine. For a sweet desert, use the curler to slice off sensational chocolate curls. The marble will not stick to foods.
feature_bullets: Set includes a marble round board, steel pin and curling knife
Cheese curler slices off a very thin curl of cheese; can also slice chocolate
Use curled cheese and chocolates with desserts or to decorate a cheese board

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
